verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Mimi mzabibu (wa kweli)
nanyi,
mu matawi yangu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mimi mzabibu wa kweli,
nanyi matawi yangu,
mimi mzabibu,
Kaeni ndani yangu,
nami nikae ndani yenyu,
mimi mzabibu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Asiyekaa ndani yangu
hawezi kuzaa matunda,
mimi mzabibu.
Bila nguvu yangu,
mimi hawezi kufanya
lolote,
mimi mzabibu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mimi mzabibu wa kweli,
na Baba yangu
ni mkulima,
mimi mzabibu.
Tawi lenye kutozaa,
Baba yangu ni mkulima,
mimi mzabibu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tawi linalozaa,
matunda Baba yangu
hulisafisha,
mimi mzabibu.
Msipokaa ndani yangu,
hamwezi zaa matunda,
mimi mzabibu.
